block.p: ORNS-Josef. On July 20, 1997, husband of Rickey, father of Cindy, and (Arthur) Miller and Stuart Orns. Grandfather of Sam and Sara, and brother of Carol and (Fred) Kimmel. Brother-in-law, uncle, nephew, cousin, and friend to many. Memorial services on Sunday, July 27, 4 P.M., at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street.
ORNS-Josef. On July 20, 1997. Dear husband, father, grandfather and friend. Services Sunday, July 27, 4 PM, at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81 Street.
ORNS-Josef. We mourn the passing our our long time friend. We will miss you Yus. Renee and Sid
